title: What's Going On With Beyond Good and Evil 2?! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.05.22
description:
Go to http://chime.com/KFGAMES to get started with Chime today.

Go to http://meundies.com/kindafunny to get 20% off your first order plus free shipping.

Tim and Blessing talk about Beyond Good and Evil 2 hiring a lead writer, Square Enix selling stakes in its studios, and a big Mario Kart 8 Deluxe DLC leak.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:01 - Housekeeping
A new PS I Love You XOXO is up right now featuring the one and only Jake Baldino! The guys talk about which PlayStation studios had the best glow up. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services.
00:05:58 - MVC2 Arcade Cabinet!!!
The Roper Report   -
00:09:30 - Six Years After Its Announcement, Beyond Good & Evil 2 Hires Its Lead Writer
00:21:24 - Square Enix is ‘looking to sell stakes’ in its studios
00:29:55 -  Ad
00:32:00 - A Mario Kart 8 Deluxe music datamine may have revealed future DLC circuits
00:40:38 - Xbox Series S games could potentially see improved performance
00:43:45 - MultiVersus is getting a ‘big overhaul’ of its hit detection system
00:48:17 - New Sonic Origins update finally fixes Tails’ AI issues
00:49:59 - EA has removed incest from The Sims 4, which was accidentally added to the game last week
00:53:00 - Out today
00:54:52 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Blessing & Saint Cola
Tuesday - Greg & Tim
Wednesday - Bless & Greg
Thursday - Bless & Tim
Friday - Tim & ???

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny
